message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. I understand that the true worth of this item may be subjective and deeply personal to you, which is why I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950000. This offer represents a significant discount compared to its market value, allowing you to secure a piece that could potentially grow in significance over time. I believe that by presenting this offer now, we can explore the mutual benefits of this transaction and ensure that both parties are satisfied with the outcome. If you're interested in learning more about the product or discussing the details further, please let me know. I look forward to the possibility of working together.
